scene_summary.description: A dark, foreboding encounter in Victorian London as Scrooge meets the Ghost of Christmas Yet To Come, a silent phantom shrouded in black. The spirit leads him through various locations including the stock exchange, a squalid pawn shop, a deathbed chamber, and finally to the Cratchit household and a churchyard.
